definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

sentences.english: Landscape architecture is a profession not more than one hundred years since its coming.
sentences.chinese: 景觀建築學是一門不過百年的新興學科。

sentences.english: This project is for designers with architectonic skills.
sentences.chinese: 該項目是與建築學技能設計師。

sentences.english: In architecture, there's a big difference between a sketch and a plan.
sentences.chinese: 在建築學裏，草圖和設計圖有着天壤之別。

sentences.english: It is worth to re-examine the conventional way of architectural education and to discuss how makes it face to the future.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的建築學教學如何面向未來是值得需要思考的。

sentences.english: Only one had earned a college degree in architecture.
sentences.chinese: 其中只有一個人得到了建築學的大學學位。

sentences.english: I guess I need to buy one of those Architectural Digest magazines!
sentences.chinese: 我想我需要買一本建築學摘要的雜誌來讀一讀。

sentences.english: He obtained a diploma in architecture.
sentences.chinese: 他獲得了建築學的學位證書。

sentences.english: I was studying architecture by going to see actual building, and reading books about them.
sentences.chinese: 當時我通過實地參觀來和讀書來學習建築學。

sentences.english: It is a required class for M. Arch. students.
sentences.chinese: 本課程是建築學碩士學生的必修課程。
園林建築學現今被公認是美術的一種。

sentences.english: There are many islands in the many islands in the inland sea of japan that are architectonicaly designed into a small cities.
sentences.chinese: 日本內海有許多島嶼被設計成建築學上的小城。

sentences.english: University graduate in architectonics , fresh graduate is permitted also.
sentences.chinese: 建築學本科畢業，應屆畢業生也可。

sentences.english: Architecture is pretty much everything in one subject.
sentences.chinese: 建築學是一門包羅萬象的學科。

sentences.english: It is one Xin Xing boundary science that architecture and gardens mimic combining each other.
sentences.chinese: 它是建築學與園林學相結合的一門新興邊緣。

sentences.english: The architectural magnificence of this structure does not stop at its foundations.
sentences.chinese: 這一建築在建築學上的偉岸之處並非只在於它的地基。

sentences.english: Hadid is considered the high priest of deconstructive architecture.
sentences.chinese: 哈迪德的設計理念反應了建築學中的解構主義理念。

definition: University of Science and Technology Beijing
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2
